query: INSERT INTO Animals (name, speciesId, birthday, size, createdAt, updatedAt) VALUES ('Coco', (SELECT id FROM Species WHERE speciesName = 'Dwarf Hamster'), '2020-02-12', 'Small', NOW(), NOW()), ('Ted', (SELECT id FROM Species WHERE speciesName = 'Teddy bear hamster'), '2021-02-12', 'Small', NOW(), NOW()), ('Coco', (SELECT id FROM Species WHERE speciesName = 'Jack-Russel'), '2020-02-12', 'Medium', NOW(), NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE updatedAt = VALUES(updatedAt);
